item.description:
We've seen Les perform at Toad previoulsly, and she was GREAT!!
It's a small venue, but it has great acoustics.

Here's a link to the toad website.
(click the 'Directions' tab at the top of the page for driving and T information.)

Les Sampou:
visit her website for more information.

other notes:

Paul will be arriving early, to reserve some tables by the stage.
* the bar is usually deserted at 6:30pm, but it fills up quickly *
....... so arrive before 7:00pm if possible.

* Also, the bar doesn't serve food, but there is a mexican restaurant across the street where you can grab something quick to eat.
item.how_to_find_us: Paul, and I, will meet you in the bar
item.name: Les Sampou @ Toad, Cambridge, MA
